attributes.action: All pupil's to leave school with Functional Skills with or without a disabillity
attributes.additional_details:
The young people of today are getting let down from the education board as the children who are academically challenged are not given the opportunity of leaving school with any grades.
Childern who have additional learning needs but not enough to go to a specialist school, are getting the funding they need, but not gaining any extra help. Schools are abusing the funding system and leaving parents devastated and no where to turn.
attributes.background: To many children are leaving school with no G,C,S,E's, which is preventing them from obtaining futher education and stopping them from getting futher employment which is leading them into Gang life or criminal inactivity to make money.
